title: Protect The Vessel
description: Are you protecting what matters? In “Protect The Vessel,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reminds us that we are vessels that can either foster bitterness or make way for God’s healing hand in our lives.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Are you protecting what matters? In “Protect The Vessel,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reminds us that we are vessels that can either foster bitterness or make way for God’s healing hand in our lives.
